item.description:
Amici... Time to take our meetups outside for the summer. As in year's past, Elizabeth Park in Hartford is offering another exciting Summer Concert Series. I've heard from so many that Latanya Farrell is an amazing R&B singer. Click on her website to read up and listen to some of her music.

http://www.latanyafarrell.com/default.aspx?name=bio&page=1&ID=-1

We can meet and picnic there. Every Wednesday through out the Summer there is a live concert to enjoy!

You can click below if you are interested in other Wednesday concerts. Locomotion might be another one we set up in late August.

http://www.elizabethpark.org/summer-concert-series-2012.htm

FREE TO THE PUBLIC
Elizabeth Park, Hartford CT
Every Wednesday, 6:30 pm to 8:00 pm
Sponsored by
The Evelyn W. Preston Memorial Fund
Bank of America, Trustee
item.name: Elizabeth Park Summer Concert Series - Latanya Farrell
